author: Times staff writers
title: Grammys 2017: Play-at-home ballot
text: "Coloring Book" | Chance the Rapper "And the Anonymous Nobody" | De La Soul "Major Key" | DJ Khaled "Blank Face LP" | Schoolboy Q "The Life of Pablo" | Kanye West Country album "Big Day In a Small Town" | Brandy Clark "Full Circle" | Loretta Lynn "A Sailor's Guide to Earth" | Sturgill Simpson "Ripcord" | Keith Urban "22, a Million" | Bon Iver "Blackstar" | David Bowie "The Hope Six Demolition Project" | PJ Harvey "Post Pop Depression" | Iggy Pop "A Moon Shaped Pool" | Radiohead Credits: Programming by and , design by Lily Mihalik.
